frontmatter.title: Securing your graph
frontmatter.description: How to secure your graph by enforcing a safelist of registered operations

headings.value: 1. Install the warthog command line tool
2. Push your schema to the Warthog schema registry
3. Register operations from your client bundle
4. Disable subscription support on Warthog Server
5. Add the operation registry plugin to Warthog Server
6. Start Warthog Server with Warthog Engine enabled
The server indicates Access denied. (or AccessDenied) when fetching the manifest
Operations aren't being forbidden or operations which should be permitted are not allowed
Target variants/tags other than current(default, no variant/tag)

pages.title: 5. Connect your API to a client
